tool_description: Captures and organizes inquiries and leads from all listing platforms into a unified tracking system with contact management.

listing_id.description: Listing identifier to track leads for

lead_scoring.description: Enable automatic lead scoring based on inquiry details

auto_response.description: Send automatic response to new leads

error_messages: Listing not found: The specified listing ID is not in the system
Platform integration error: Unable to connect to one or more specified platforms
Lead data incomplete: Some lead information is missing required fields
usage: Provide listing ID and optionally specify platforms to monitor and lead management preferences. Returns organized lead data with scoring and contact information.

new_leads.description: Number of new leads since last check

high_priority_leads.description: Number of high-scoring leads requiring immediate attention

response_rate.description: Percentage of leads that received responses
